Package org.example

Interface GoogleSheetsApplicationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GoogleSheetsService
public interface GoogleSheetsApplicationInterface

  • Method Details

    • testConnection

      void testConnection() throws Exception
      Tests the connection to the Google Sheets API. Throws an exception if the connection cannot be established.
      Throws:
      Exception - if unable to connect to the Google Sheets API.

    • getAvailableSheets

      List<String> getAvailableSheets() throws Exception
      Retrieves a list of available sheet names in the spreadsheet.
      Returns:
      A List of Strings representing the names of the sheets available.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation.

    • getItemsInSheet

      List<Crop> getItemsInSheet(String sheetName) throws Exception
      Retrieves a list of Crop objects from a specified sheet.
      Parameters:
      sheetName - The name of the sheet to retrieve items from.
      Returns:
      A List of Crop objects representing each row in the specified sheet.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation.

    • addDataRow

      void addDataRow(Crop crop) throws Exception
      Adds a new Crop object as a row to the end of the specified sheet.
      Parameters:
      crop - The Crop object to be added as a new row.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation.

    • checkAndDisplayCrop

      boolean checkAndDisplayCrop(Crop crop) throws Exception
      Checks the existence of a Crop by its ID and displays its information.
      Parameters:
      crop - The Crop object to check and display.
      Returns:
      true if the crop exists in the sheet, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation.

    • updateCrop

      void updateCrop(Crop crop) throws Exception
      Updates an existing Crop object's corresponding row in its sheet.
      Parameters:
      crop - The Crop object to update.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation or if the Crop ID is not found.

    • deleteDataRow

      void deleteDataRow(Crop crop) throws Exception
      Clears the data for a given Crop object's corresponding row in its sheet. Note: This operation does not delete the row to maintain the integrity of the sheet's structure.
      Parameters:
      crop - The Crop object to clear data for.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation or if the Crop ID is not found.

    • getSheetIdByName

      String getSheetIdByName(String sheetName) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception
